## rsi() function

[https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Relative\_strength\_index](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Relative_strength_index)

Note: the number of results will be `period` less than the number of processed inputs.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
export declare function rsi(period: number): Transducer<number, number>;
```
